nodes.text: Bammy Decree was a male mechanic during the time of 18 BBY. He owned an apartment located on the moon of Nar Shaddaa.
He fixed up the Stellar Envoy for the local crime lord, Rej Taunt. While working on it he found the SuperFlow IV computer and made a short history of the previous owners of the ship.

In 43 ABY he was met by Tobb Jadak and Flitcher Poste, they asked what he knew of the Stellar Envoy and if he knew who currently owned it.
He owned a garage in the Duros sector where he repaired the Stellar Envoy after it crashed into the Jendirian Valley III because of damage it had sustained from Republic weapons fire.
